message.name: ERR_ILIREL_ILITYPE_MRE
message.locale: Multiple InstructionLineItemRelation records returned with instructionlineitemID "%1s" and type "%2s".

message.name: ERR_SERVICESUPPLIER_XFV_TYPECODE
message.locale: No Service Supplier found to provide a Service of type "%1s".

message.name: ERR_BANKAC_STATUS_FINAINSTID_MRE
message.locale: When checking the bank account status as part of payment processing for case %1s, multiple financial instructions have been found where only one was expected.

message.name: INF_PAYMENT_INSTRUMENT_SUSPENDED_SUBJECT
message.locale: A payment for Case %1s of type %2s for %3s %4s has been suspended

message.name: INF_PAYMENT_SUSPENDED
message.locale: A payment for Case %1s of type %2s for %3s has been suspended. This payment is in excess of the maximum product payment limit and requires manual approval before it can be issued.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCT_LOAN_UNIMPLEMENTED
message.locale: A product of type loan has not yet been implemented.

message.name: INF_PAYMENT_NOT_ISSUED_INVALID_BANK_ACCOUNT
message.locale: The payment on case %1s of type %2s for nominee %3s was canceled as the specified bank account is closed. Please change the bank account for this nominee and reissue the payment.
The payment on case %1s of type %2s for nominee %3s was cancelled as the specified bank account is closed. Please change the bank account for this nominee and reissue the payment.

message.name: INF_PAYMENT_NOT_ISSUED
message.locale: Payment not issued on case %1s of type %2s for nominee %3s.

message.name: INF_UTILITY_PAYMENT_NOT_ISSUED_INVALID_BANK_ACCOUNT
message.locale: Payment not issued to utility %1s as the specified bank account is closed. Please change the bank account for this utility and reissue the payment.

message.name: INF_UTILITY_PAYMENT_NOT_ISSUED
message.locale: Payment not issued to utility %1s as the specified bank account is closed.

message.name: INF_SERVICESUPPLIER_PAYMENT_NOT_ISSUED_INVALID_BANK_ACCOUNT
message.locale: Payment not issued to service supplier %1s as the specified bank account is closed. Please change the bank account for this utility and reissue the payment.

message.name: INF_SERVICESUPPLIER_PAYMENT_NOT_ISSUED
message.locale: Payment not issued to service supplier %1s as the specified bank account is closed.

message.name: INF_PRODUCTPROVIDER_PAYMENT_NOT_ISSUED_INVALID_BANK_ACCOUNT
message.locale: Payment not issued to product provider %1s as the specified bank account is closed. Please change the bank account for this utility and reissue the payment.

message.name: INF_PRODUCTPROVIDER_PAYMENT_NOT_ISSUED
message.locale: Payment not issued to product provider %1s as the specified bank account is closed.
